summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses the critical deployment blank page issue through error boundaries, loading states, fallback content, logging, and graceful error handling. All 10 requirements are implemented with appropriate fallback mechanisms and defensive programming. The diff shows extensive changes across the frontend stack with proper error handling, React Suspense boundaries, comprehensive logging, and default content for all sections.

hallucinated_features.description: ConnectionStatus component with connection state UI and retry functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: This component was added but was not explicitly requested in any requirement. While it supports the general goal of error handling, it goes beyond the specified acceptance criteria.
